lines.text: Well, well, well... what do we have here? The game's over, bitch. This time you're dead for sure. First, I'm gonna fuck you. Then, I'm gonna slice you into little pieces.
Sounds nice and kinky to me. Too bad you're not double-jointed.
Why?
Because if it were, you'd be able to bend over and kiss your ass goodbye!
God, Wes? That faggot? Now who the hell wants him? If you could keep him away from me, I'd be eternally grateful to you.
You're the one who keeps leading him on!
Let me make this simpler so that even YOU can understand. I wouldn't fuck him if he had the last dick on earth!

[screams in anguish as she lunges at Brenda]
AUUUUGGGGGHHHHH!
Go fuck an iceberg!
Well, well. It looks like the little slut's at it again.
Cut it out, Cindy, we're only talking.
I know it's not your fault, Wes.
Fuck off, bitch.
I don't want to see any of you guys around my schoolyard. You or any of your scum!
Aw man, who the fuck are you, the principal?
THAT'S RIGHT! And as for you, Vince, if you want to trash your life, go ahead. But do it your own time, not mine! YOU HEAR THAT?

[sarcastically]
YES... SIR.

[Brenda confronts Fargo and Red in the warehouse]
Welcome home... ASSHOLES!
You must be out of your mind, coming here!

[laughs]
Maybe she's looking for a little bit of what we gave her sister, huh?
Maybe she's looking for a whole lot more than what we gave her sister!
For Christ's sake... it's wasn't my fault!

[flicks open switchblade]
You're gonna die, Vince.

[the girls are in gym class working out]
Pick it up, Brenda.

[low]
Stuff it, bitch.
That goes for you too, Stella!

[low]
Kiss my black ass.
Get that ass up. Get moving, Francine!

[low]
Up yours.

[has the upper hand on Jake]
See? I told you to stay where you were. Now look what you got yourself into. You know what you look like? You look like a pig in a slaughterhouse, ready to butcher.
[opens her switchblade]
You ever wonder what a pig must feel like, before they slit his throat? Or cut his balls off? Couldn't have been any worse than my sister must of felt. Or Francine? She was pregnant.

[Jake spits at her]
Fucking bastard. It's not gonna be quick, Jake.
Wow! Cindy, what a babe!
Look, but don't touch, sweetie!

[Brenda is standing in Underwood's office after the fight with Cindy]
Now I'm sorry about your sister, Brenda. The police are doing everything they can. But she shouldn't have been there in the first place.
Fuck you!

[smiles]
You're a tough little bitch, aren't you? I like that. But I don't give second warnings. So consider yourself suspended.

[as he's hovering over Brenda lying on the ground]
I am going to cut your heart out and EAT IT!

[Jake and the Scars are sitting on the bleachers on the track field outside of Vince's school... Vince runs up]
What's going on, Vinnie?
It's all over school, Jake... the girl we raped. Do you think she's gonna die?
Look, we've been through this, all right? So just calm the fuck down! I mean she's a retard, right? She can't even talk.
Yeah... and the only way anyone's gonna know is if Vinnie here opens his big fat mouth.

[menacingly]
You wouldn't do that... would you Vince?

[nervously smiling]
Hey Jake... you know I'd never do anything to hurt the Scars!
Just forget about it. Now tell me where I can find that bitch who cut me.

[after getting suspended from school]
I am never gonna get out of this place.
